thread.title: Lehigh to host screening Thursday of ‘My Italian Secret: The Forgotten Heroes’ (Lehigh University)

author: wn.com
title: Lehigh to host screening Thursday of ‘My Italian Secret: The Forgotten Heroes’ (Lehigh University)
text: ( Source : Lehigh University ) Italian cycling legend Gino Bartali secretly helped save Jews from Nazi persecution by transporting fake identification papers and messages in his bicycle frame as he trained for the Tour de France . Other
